-N_Ot99GWjYjrv9Gs-fP.description: Proud and honorable, specialising in brute strength. Primary stats are strength and constitution.
-N_Ot99GWjYjrv9Gs-fP.name: Fighter

-N_OzueqvUwAUNXnlWpb.description: Unscrupulous and underhanded, strikes from the shadows. Primary stats are dexterity and charisma.
-N_OzueqvUwAUNXnlWpb.name: Thief

-N_P0pcakZhKbNDftKoc.description: Trained in the arcane arts and proficient with all forms of magic. Primary stat is intelligence.
-N_P0pcakZhKbNDftKoc.name: Mage

-NJLRtY1B4JdDuOGq2sd.description: A powerful weapon swing that deals additional slashing damage.

-NJPxBkEam2oJZtHIBgY.description: Stand your ground to greatly increase armour but reduce mobility.

-NJQ2hml_9m6iHzAfES5.description: Roar at the enemy to lower their dexterity.
